CIN Methods

Requires: VI Scripting

Inherits from Node»GrowableFunction. View the class hierarchy.

MethodDescription
Add Parameter AfterAdds a new parameter after the item you specify in Index and returns a reference to the new pair of terminals. Details
Create C FileCreates a C file for the Code Interface Node at the path you specify. Details
Load Code ResourceLoads a code resource from a code resource (.lsb) file. Details
Purge Code ResourceDeletes the code associated with the Code Interface Node. Details
Remove ParameterRemoves the parameter at the index you specify. Details
